resources.string: It looks like there was an error signing in to the application
Make sure the scale led is steady on red color before you continue. In any other case press and hold the button for 7 seconds until it changes its state.
Introduce the server address or scan the QR code.
There is something wrong with the server, or the address is incorrect.
Select the scale you wish to add:
Select the house where you wish to install the scale:
Select the litter in which you wish to install the scale:
Set a name to indentify the scale:
Select the BlackBox you wish to add:
Select the house where you wish to install the BlackBox:
Set a name to identify the BlackBox:
Make sure the BlackBox led is steady on red color before you continue. In any other case press and hold the button for 7 seconds until it changes its state.
Establish the WiFi password of the current network:
The scale will be empty for some seconds. After that, you will set a known weight and it will be weighted for some seconds. Make sure the scale is steady throughout the process.
Please wait while the scale is being calibrated...
Set a known weight in grams:
Please wait while the wind sensor is being calibrated...
Please wait while the CO2 sensor is being calibrated...
ERROR. Please check the connected WiFi.
